keepConnect.name: Zauna da aka haɗa
keepConnect.helperText: Idan ka latsa hanyar farawa, to, ka kiyaye hanyar haɗi. Wannan yana buƙatar hankali cewa za a sake haɗa hanyar ci gaba bayan an cire shi.

url.name: URL
url.helperText: Haɗi URL, misali WS: //192.168.0.2: 7001, ko WWS: //example.com/path
url.error: URL daidai URL ne na fara da WS: // ko WWS: //
